name: C://TEXTRIS.EXE (traviswhendrix, vgmede, radaeze)
description:
C: \> cat README.txt

The T.E.T.R.I.S. module has been installed. Your mission must be uncovered. Stay hidden. Stay safe. Follow the instructions below and you will accomplish your objective.

/*~-~-~-~-~-~-~*/

TETRIS MODULE INSTRUCTIONS

Spell words left->right or top->bottom.

Move: ASD/Arrow Keys

Rotate Left: . 

Rotate Right:  /

Drop Block: W/Up Arrow

/*~-~-~-~-~-~-~*/

You have your orders. Good Luck.

- C
